title: Nostalgia PCM405RETRORED Hard and Sugar Free Countertop Cotton Candy Maker, Includes 2 Reusable Cones and Scoop, Retro Red
features: Flossing or hard candies: Unique extractor head allows you to use traditional flossing sugar or your favorite hard candies to make delicious cotton candy
Nostalgia cotton candy kits: Make cotton candy with these great Nostalgia cotton candy kits (Cotton candy flossing sugar - Ccfs300, hard candy party kit - Hck800)
Simple operation: Warm up the unit, add your flossing sugar, and enjoy your cotton candy in just a few short minutes
Retro design: This unit has retro design and details that will bring you back to the time of record-spinning jukeboxes and American muscle cars
Clear rim guard: Acts as a protective guard and lets you watch the cotton candy being made
Accessories: Includes 2 reusable cones, 1 sugar scoop, and 1 extractor head
Easy cleaning: Unit disassembles for easy cleaning

SAFETY FIRST: Thoroughly clean Cotton Candy machine after each use. Refer to included Instruction Manual for best cleaning results. DO NOT allow sugar to enter the sides of the extractor head. DO NOT operate if sugar DOES enter sides of extractor head
description: Create fluffy, melt-in-your-mouth cotton candy from the Comfort of home! Use your favorite hard candies or flossing sugar To create a fluffy cotton candy cones The whole family will love. The clear rim acts as a protective guard and allows for easy viewing of the cotton candy. The unit includes 2-reusable cones, 1-Sugar scoop, and 1-extractor head. SAFETY FIRST: Thoroughly clean Cotton Candy machine after each use. Refer to included Instruction Manual for best cleaning results. DO NOT allow sugar to enter the sides of the extractor head. DO NOT operate if sugar DOES enter sides of extractor head.
